title.rendered: INTECH will enhance operational capabilities of a bulk oil terminal in Pakistan’s Punjab province for a major regional petroleum company

content.rendered:
INTECH will equip a bulk oil terminal in Pakistan’s Punjab province, operated by a major regional petroleum company, with its high performance auto tank gauging solution; enhancing its operational capabilities by improving critical oil terminal performance indicators.

With its powerful regional presence due to a strong business and delivery network, INTECH has established itself as the leading provider of oil and gas system integration services across all streams in Pakistan. Over a period of more than 20 years, INTECH has become a name for reliability, excellence, experience, and innovation; compiling a remarkable list of successful project executions with major national and private oil and gas players in the region.

INTECH was requested by the client, a major regional petroleum company, for provision of services at its bulk oil terminal in Punjab. Briefly, INTECH’s scope on this project includes supply, installation, engineering, configuration, and commissioning of Auto Tank Gauging System. Summary detail is as follows:

  • Site Survey and compilation of initial documentation
  • In house hardware engineering, functional design testing, internal testing, and in-house training for client personnel
  • On-Site Installation of Instruments, equipment, cables and support system
  • Cable laying, trenching, back filling and related civil works
  • Establishment of Field Control Unit
  • Configuration and Testing
  • Commissioning and formal hand-over of the implemented system to end user
  • On-site training for client O&M personnel

INTECH’s solution will enable the bulk oil terminal to reduce uncertainty in product inventory and transfers, improve safety by compliance with standards and utilization of certified devices, and simplify overall operations.

INTECH will mobilize its resources from UAE and engineering back office for the execution of this project.

About INTECH’s Integrated Control Systems (ICS) Solutions

INTECH’s Integrated Control Systems offer a complete array of vendor neutral control automation and integration solutions ranging from basic Process Control, Safety, F&G and Power Management applications to data networks, site security, instrument management and fully integrated control and safety systems. Our third party start-up and commissioning services ensure minimum downtime and accelerated glitch-free execution. INTECH’s ICS is a “One-Stop Automation Solution” that improves plant safety, reliability and efficiency while lowering costs and increasing returns.

For more information visit: https://www.intechww.com/automation/integrated-control-systems/

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation Inc. is an international Control Systems engineering and Systems Integration company delivering reliable automation solutions to the Oil & Gas sector since 1991. INTECH has done projects in 31 countries across 6 continents with regional offices in 13 countries, equipping it with 2000+ engineering man-years of experience. INTECH’s vendor-neutral approach and extensive experience help serve both regional and global customers with the highest standards of quality and reliability.

INTECH covers all traditional asset classes (upstream, midstream & downstream) as well as shale and buoy automation. Its wide range of solutions covers traditional control system automation as well as hydraulic (surface and sub-surface) control system automation and advanced software solutions for operations and asset management. Customers benefit from INTECH’s lump-sum turnkey solutions to save costs and increase plant productivity.

For more Information, visit: https://www.intechww.com
